title: I paid for rp but i didnt get anything
body: I purchased 155 rp with Mobile payment but i haven't got anything, and my amount of my phone has gone.

replies.body: Are you able to check if your provider has it as pending or processing?  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you haven't received your RP, and our billing team will take a look just in case.  We'll be able to see if we received the purchase request, and will reply back as soon as we can.
